title: The doctrines of the resurrection and the reward to come, considered as the grand motives to an holy life. Discoursed of, from 1. Cor. XV. 58. / By the late pious and learned John Worthington, D.D..
author: Worthington, John, 1618-1671.
publisher: Printed for Awnsham Churchill, at the Black-Swan in Ave-Mary-Lane.,
